entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
